definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to meet with (sb who is paying a visit)/CL:次[ci4]
not to see/not to meet/to have disappeared/to be missing
it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
rare/not familiar (to the speaker)/sth rarely experience/hard to see
from this, it can be seen that...

sentences.english: No suspected cancer cells or cancer cells were found.
sentences.chinese: 宫颈刮片检查两组均未查见可疑癌细胞或癌细胞。

sentences.english: no one else can see you shake your head.
The scholarship and research grants distribution is as appendix table 1.
sentences.chinese: 奖学金和奖教金具体分布详请见附件1。

sentences.english: Back to the room to sleep, you may have seen her with the quilt, the mother.
sentences.chinese: 回房睡觉，也许你已见她加上的被子，那个是母亲。

sentences.english: Can I see Mr. Matthews, please?
Hello, I'm here to see Mr. Carlene.
sentences.chinese: 你好，我是来见卡连先生的。

sentences.english: Today, I am within sight of my heaven.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我望得见我的天堂了。

sentences.english: Should the raw flesh change and turn white, he must go to the priest.
sentences.chinese: 红肉若复原，又变白了，他就要来见祭司。

sentences.english: He told his troubles to every Tom, Dick and Harry.
sentences.chinese: 他见人就诉说自己的烦恼，不论张三，抑或李四。

sentences.english: Since Rick never saw a ghost, he doesn't believe that they exist.
sentences.chinese: 瑞克从没见过鬼，所以不相信他们的存在。

sentences.english: Don't give me any lip service. I want to see some action!
sentences.chinese: 别对我说好听的，我要见你的行动。

sentences.english: Have you ever seen a one -legged dog making its way down the street?
sentences.chinese: 你可曾见过一只在街上默默行走的的独脚小狗？

sentences.english: Achilles is then told to go see Agamemnon.
sentences.chinese: 之后，阿喀琉斯被叫去见阿伽门农。

sentences.english: Since I hope to see you again, I'll say au revoir rather than adieu.
sentences.chinese: 因为我希望再次见你，我将说再见，而非告别。

sentences.english: The village is no stranger to curious projects either.
sentences.chinese: 在华西村，各种奇奇怪怪的工程也不少见。

sentences.english: Sorry. Mr. Green can't see you now.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，格林师长教师此刻不能见您。

definition: not to see/not to meet/to have disappeared/to be missing
to see each other/to meet in person
to know/to become aware of/also pr. [zhi1 dao5]
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
to look at/to see/to see (a doctor)/to visit
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to
